listCustomFeats.name: Howling Charge
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Frequency once per day

You Stride twice up to your Speed and make a melee Strike. If your Strike hits and damages an enemy, each ally within 30 feet that can hear you become Quickened for 1 minute but can only use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.
On a critical hit, enemies within range get stunned 1.

listCustomFeats.name: True Scent
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Frequency once per day

You can heighten your senses to non-magically gain the effects of a 6th-rank truesight spell for 10 minutes. The ability to “see through” illusions and polymorph effects applies to your imprecise scent.

listCustomFeats.name: Shredding Strikes
listCustomFeats.textDescription: On a critical hit with an unarmed strike gained from this ancestry, you deal an additional 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

listCustomFeats.name: Pack Eternal
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Prerequisites Chosen Pack

As long as two members of the pack, including yourself, are adjacent to each other, neither of them can become off-guard due to flanking unless both are flanked. If adjacent to more than one member of the pack, all eligible allies can benefit at a given time. The benefit is negated for everyone if at least you and any one eligible member of the pack are flanked.

listCustomFeats.name: Avenge Pack
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Frequency once every 10 minutes
Requirements You are within 30 feet of an ally with the dying condition

Make a Strike. Roll twice on the attack roll and use the higher result.

listCustomFeats.name: Death's Whistle
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Prerequisites Wither Ulfrikin heritage
Frequency once per day

All creatures in a 30-foot emanation must attempt a Will save with a DC equal to your Class DC or Spell DC, whichever is higher. Spirits receive a -2 circumstance penalty to the roll.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success Frightened 1
Failure Frightened 2
Critical Failure Frightened 2 and Paralyzed for 1 round

listCustomFeats.name: Ulfrikin Weapon Familiarity
listCustomFeats.textDescription: You have familiarity with the greatpick, halberd, pick, and war flail - for the purposes of proficiency, you treat these martial weapons as simple weapons. At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these weapons, you get its critical specialization effect.

listCustomFeats.name: Canine Unarmed Brutality
listCustomFeats.textDescription: Whenever you score a critical hit with an unarmed attack you gained from a ulfrikin ancestry feat or from the fanged ulfrikin heritage, you apply the unarmed attack’s critical specialization effect.

listCustomFeats.name: Rallying Howl
listCustomFeats.textDescription: You and all allies in a 20-foot emanation gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion and mental effects for 1 round.

listCustomFeats.name: Chosen Pack
listCustomFeats.textDescription: Choose up to four allies, they are considered a part of your pack. Members of your pack, including yourself, gain a +4 circumstance bonus to aid each other.

listCustomFeats.name: Ulfrikin Lore
listCustomFeats.textDescription: You paid attention to the tales passed down among your pack. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in Wolfkin Lore.

listCustomFeats.name: Canine Speak
listCustomFeats.textDescription: You can understand the barks, whines, and growls of wolves and similar animals as its own language. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with wolves, dogs, coyotes, and other canine mammals . The GM determines which other animals count for this ability.

listCustomFeats.name: Scent Trace
listCustomFeats.textDescription: The bonus from imprecise scent can be applied to Perceptions checks to Sense Motive and to Seek against illusions.

listCustomFeats.name: Deathly Howl
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Frequency once per hour
Trigger You frighten a creature.

Extend the duration of the frightened condition you give the target by 1 round.

listCustomFeats.name: Hunted Pounce
listCustomFeats.textDescription: Stride twice and then attempt to Shove.

listCustomFeats.name: Dire Awakening
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Prerequisites Dire Ulfrikin heritage

Once per day, you can cast enlarge on yourself as an innate primal spell. When you do, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

listCustomFeats.name: Pack Tactics
listCustomFeats.textDescription: If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your allies, that enemy is off-guard against you.

listCustomFeats.name: Wolf Thrash
listCustomFeats.textDescription: Your jaws unarmed attack deals 1d8 piercing damage instead of 1d6 and gains the grapple trait.

listCustomHeritages.name: Wither Ulfrikin
listCustomHeritages.textDescription: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to locate haunts within 60 feet when using the Seek action. Your flat check to target concealed haunts is DC 3 instead of DC 5, and your flat check to target undetected haunts is DC 9 instead of DC 11.

listCustomHeritages.name: Dire Ulfrikin
listCustomHeritages.textDescription: You gain 10 Hit Points from your ancestry instead of 8 and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to Demoralize foes.

listCustomHeritages.name: Hunter Ulfrikin
listCustomHeritages.textDescription: You become trained in Stealth (or another skill if you were already trained in Stealth) and gain the Terrain Stalker skill feat, except you must choose underbrush and you can Sneak no more than 10 feet instead of 5 feet without attempting a Stealth check.

listCustomHeritages.name: Arctic Ulfrikin
listCustomHeritages.textDescription: You gain cold resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1), and you treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less extreme (incredible cold becomes extreme, extreme cold becomes severe, and so on).

listCustomHeritages.name: Fanged Ulfrikin
listCustomHeritages.textDescription: You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your jaws are in the brawling group and have the finesse and unarmed traits.

listCustomSpecial.name: Howling Charge
listCustomSpecial.description:
Frequency once per day
Stride twice. If you end your movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can make a melee Strike against that enemy. On a hit, all allies within 30 feet that can hear you become quickened for 1 minute but can only use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike. On a critical hit, enemies within range get stunned 1.

listCustomSpecial.name: True Scent
listCustomSpecial.description:
Frequency once per day
You can heighten your senses to non-magically gain the effects of a 6th-rank truesight spell for 10 minutes. The ability to “see through” illusions and polymorph effects applies to your imprecise scent.

listCustomSpecial.name: Darkvision
listCustomSpecial.description: You can see in darkness and dim light just as well as you can see in bright light, though your vision in darkness is in black and white.
listCustomSpecial.src: Ancestries Unleashed: Rabbitfolk by Luis Loza

listCustomSpecial.name: Avenge Pack
listCustomSpecial.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes
Requirements You are within 30 feet of an ally with the dying condition

Make a Strike. Roll twice on the attack roll and use the higher result.

listCustomSpecial.name: Death's Whistle
listCustomSpecial.description:
Prerequisites Wither Ulfrikin heritage
Frequency once per day

All creatures in a 30-foot emanation must attempt a Will save with a DC equal to your Class DC or Spell DC, whichever is higher. Spirits receive a -2 circumstance penalty to the roll.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success Frightened 1
Failure Frightened 2
Critical Failure Frightened 2 and Paralyzed for 1 round

listCustomSpecial.name: Deathly Howl
listCustomSpecial.description:
Frequency once per hour
Trigger You frighten a creature.
Extend the duration of the frightened condition you give the target by 1 round.

listCustomSpecial.name: Hunted Pounce
listCustomSpecial.description: Stride twice and then attempt to Shove.

listCustomAncestries.name: Ulfrikin
listCustomAncestries.description: The Ulfrikin, known as the "Wolf Children" in their native tongue, are beings of anthropomorphic wolfkin who dwell in the frozen north of Runidal. Their society is structured around tightly-knit tribal communities with a clear hierarchical pack structure, where leadership and loyalty are paramount. Highly skilled in combat, the Ulfrikin uphold a martial code of honor that prioritizes the protection of their pack above all else. Their resilience and adaptability to the harsh northern climate are unmatched, yet they face challenges in preserving their distinct identity when mingling with other ancestries, such as humans.
listCustomAncestries.languages: Common, Ulfrikin, Additional languages equal to your Intelligence modifier (if it’s positive). Dwarven, Elven, Goblin, Jotun, Kholo, Rabbitfolk, and any other languages to which you have access (such as the languages prevalent in your region).
listCustomAncestries.special:
Low-Light Vision You can see in dim light as though it were bright light, so you ignore the concealed condition due to dim light.

Sensitive Nose You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet. This means you can use your sense of smell to determine a creature’s location. The GM will usually double the range if you’re downwind from the creature or halve the range if you’re upwind. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek a creature or object within the range of your scent.
